issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
Noticed that ebs volumes attached to windows8 guests are not automatically brought online, formatted, etc.. They do not result in a partition/logical disk. This might be a dup of a pre-existing ticket, but I'm having trouble finding it. This seems to happen every time with KVM and sometimes with vmware. Both shown below. 
Thanks,
-M

{code}
